definitions.definition: A long bladed weapon with a grip and typically a pommel and crossguard (together forming a hilt ), which is designed to cut , stab , slash and/or hack.
examples: He took out his sword and stabbed the man in the stomach.

definitions.definition: A suit in certain playing card decks, particularly those used in Spain and Italy, or those used for divination.
One of the end bars by which the lay of a hand loom is suspended.

main_definition: ( countable ) A long bladed weapon with a grip and typically a pommel and crossguard (together forming a hilt ), which is designed to cut , stab , slash and/or hack.
secondary_definitions: A suit in certain playing card decks, particularly those used in Spain and Italy, or those used for divination.
( weaving ) One of the end bars by which the lay of a hand loom is suspended.
